data.text: Iyyoobis akkana jedhee deebise:
“Ani waan akkanaa baayʼee dhagaʼeera;
Haasaan faayidaa hin qabne kun hin dhumuu?
Utuu isin iddoo koo jiraattanii
Ani afaan kootiin isin jajjabeessee
“Yoo ani dubbadhe dhukkubni koo natti hin wayyaaʼu;
Yaa Waaqi, ati dhugumaan na dadhabsiifteerta;
Ati na kokotteessite; kunis ragaa natti taʼe;
Waaqni dheekkamsa isaatiin rukutee na ciccire;
Namoonni natti qoosuuf afaan banatan;
Waaqnis dabarsee hamootatti na kenne;
Ani nagaan jiraachaan ture; inni garuu na burkuteesse;
loltoonni isaa warri xiyyaan lolan na marsu.
Inni ammumaa amma na caccabsa;
“Ani gogaa kootti uffata gaddaa hodhadheera;
Fuulli koo booʼichaan diimateera;
Taʼus harki koo yakka tokko illee hin hojjenne;
“Yaa lafa, ati dhiiga koo hin dhoksin;
Amma iyyuu dhuga baʼaan koo samii irra jira;
Michoonni koo na tuffatu;
akkuma namni michuu isaatiif kadhatu sana
“Waggoota xinnoo booddee,
